contentList.content: Additionally, Sneak Attack can also be used as a reaction on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attacks</LSTag> to add Force damage on hit.
In addition, when you deal damage, the lowest result you can roll on the die is [1].

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Sneak_Attack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> deals an additional [1]. If you have <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ReliableTalent">Reliable Talent</LSTag>, this becomes [2].
Spend [1] of your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> this turn.
